text:
@NYGovCuomo Too late and you can't lie your way out of this one Andy! YOU ORDERED NURSING HOMES TO TAKE POSITIVE COVID-19 PATIENTS WHEN THEY TOLD YOU THEY DIDN'T HAVE RESOURCES TO CARE FOR THEM AND TO KEEP OTHERS SAFE!  ROT IN HELL YOU🤬 MURDERER!!!! @NYGovCuomo
#AGBarr @realDonaldTrump
